channel.title: Digital-Garden on rasyidhakim.com
channel.description: Recent content in Digital-Garden on rasyidhakim.com

item.description:
I found the following useful tools for maintaining RSS feeds:

  • https://morss.it/: to make truncated RSS into a full article
  • https://siftrss.com/: to filter RSS feed
  • https://github.com/damoeb/rss-proxy/: to RSS-ify website
  • https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub: to RSS-ify website

• Social media robs you of your attention and time. Take back your control from the right of social media giants.
  • Trash in, trash out, just like diet
  • Also, there is an information workflow waiting to be activated
